CustomField.formula:
IF(Contact__r.UST_Account_Claimed__c = FALSE,
"Your next step is to claim your St. Thomas account. This process establishes one password to access all online services at St. Thomas." & BR() & BR()&
"To claim your account, " & HYPERLINK("https://accountclaim.stthomas.edu", "click here.", '_blank') & " You will need to enter " & Applicant_Banner_Id__c & " as your 9-digit St. Thomas ID number." & BR() & BR()&
"Be sure to save your St. Thomas ID and the password you create in a safe place. You will need it in the future.", "")
CustomField.label: Account Claimed Portal Text
